channel.title: O_O; Some help please! :D
channel.description:
Eheh, hello everyone. ;D
I have just started playing this server, and I have a couple of questions and some help I require. T_T
Isn't the ip 127.0.0.1?
xD
And if it is, I keep getting disconnected from it whenever I try to click or move or anything...
Then it keeps saying that I can't connect because my account is already logged in. -_-;
Can anyone help me with this problem please? :D
Oh, and uhh.... What else was I going to say. >___>;
OH! And if anyone wants to add me, umm.... My name is... Let me go check. O__O
Well, I didn't exactly follow the Hamatchi thingy... Because when I pressed the .jar file in the MoparScape folder, it let me play... Please tell me if I got the right IP LOL. xD
OH ok my name is Hakre, aduhh. xD
^^;
I didn't see anyone else online, so I was just wondering where everyone went... Haha.[x
Are you all PKing or something? O_O;
Anyway, I would appreciate your help very much, and sorry I kind of typed what I thought, kind of sleepy at the moment. :D
OH one more thing! The music player and the RS thingy lags when I press some of the item ID's and Object ID's and stuff and yeah. =x
Well I was just wondering if that is supposed to happen or not, because even when I do press one of them they do not pop up. T___T
Haha ok well thanks again in advance for the help I'm sure to get. ;D
AHHHH!
Now when I try to log in with my original account, it doesn't have all my items I ::pickuped! LOL.D:
EEK, I entered the same information as the account I created, what could be the problem?! /Scared.D:
Oh well at least I do not have that disconnecting error anymore, but still I do kind of want my character back. ~_~

item.title: O_O; Some help please! :D
item.dc:creator: @jehanne jehanne
item.description:
@jehanne wrote:

127.0.0.1 is same as localhost, so its your computer. theres no such thing as a mopar server, look in server advertisement section for servers.

Read full topic

item.title: O_O; Some help please! :D
item.dc:creator: @Jok3rs Jok3rs
item.description:
@Jok3rs wrote:

Just go to the main page lol

Read full topic

item.title: O_O; Some help please! :D
item.dc:creator: @Hakre Hakre
item.description:
@Hakre wrote:

Uhh, so can you give me a link to the advertise forums please?(: And will it have all the same commands as this one? xDD Haha. Oh and can anyone find out what happened to my character please? T___T; Oh well I Guess it won’t matter if I’m going to the wrong IP anyway, lmfao.

Read full topic

item.title: O_O; Some help please! :D
item.dc:creator: @Jok3rs Jok3rs
item.description:
@Jok3rs wrote:

no its not the right ip, use the Advertise Forums to find a server then use the ip address and port they posted.

Read full topic

item.title: O_O; Some help please! :D
item.dc:creator: @Hakre Hakre
item.description:
@Hakre wrote:

Uhh, so is that the right IP adress though?D:

Haha I have no clue T__T

But uhh you are saying that 127.0.0.1 is the right IP or that it does not matter or?~

xD

Oh and check my edited first post please.(:

Read full topic

item.title: O_O; Some help please! :D
item.dc:creator: @Jok3rs Jok3rs
item.description:
@Jok3rs wrote:

Ok, You Use The Ip-Address that is posted on the topic of the server. like 5.123.1234.13 (dont use), but and u can turn the music off by going to ‘Music Player’ And Click Stop.

Read full topic

item.title: O_O; Some help please! :D
item.dc:creator: @Pk3r_Dale Pk3r Dale
item.description:
@Pk3r_Dale wrote:

your the only one on the server no one can chat to you or see you on it just go to the advertisement section

Read full topic

item.title: O_O; Some help please! :D
item.dc:creator: @Hakre Hakre
item.description:
@Hakre wrote:

Eheh, hello everyone. ;D

I have just started playing this server, and I have a couple of questions and some help I require. T_T

Isn’t the ip 127.0.0.1?

xD

And if it is, I keep getting disconnected from it whenever I try to click or move or anything…

Then it keeps saying that I can’t connect because my account is already logged in. -_-;

Can anyone help me with this problem please?

Oh, and uhh… What else was I going to say. >___>;

OH! And if anyone wants to add me, umm… My name is… Let me go check. O__O

Well, I didn’t exactly follow the Hamatchi thingy… Because when I pressed the .jar file in the MoparScape folder, it let me play… Please tell me if I got the right IP LOL. xD

OH ok my name is Hakre, aduhh. xD

^^;

I didn’t see anyone else online, so I was just wondering where everyone went… Haha.[x

Are you all PKing or something? O_O;

Anyway, I would appreciate your help very much, and sorry I kind of typed what I thought, kind of sleepy at the moment.

OH one more thing! The music player and the RS thingy lags when I press some of the item ID’s and Object ID’s and stuff and yeah. =x

Well I was just wondering if that is supposed to happen or not, because even when I do press one of them they do not pop up. T___T

Haha ok well thanks again in advance for the help I’m sure to get. ;D

AHHHH!

Now when I try to log in with my original account, it doesn’t have all my items I ::pickuped! LOL.D:

EEK, I entered the same information as the account I created, what could be the problem?! /Scared.D:

Oh well at least I do not have that disconnecting error anymore, but still I do kind of want my character back. ~_~

Read full topic
